dialogue.htmlContent:
#IF(pc.hasCompanions())

#IF(pc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType()==PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_BACK_ALLEYS_SAFE) With [com.name] by your side, you find yourself [pc.walking] down the wide alleyway, the eerie silence broken only by the occasional crash of arcane thunder high above you. There are many hiding places for a would-be attacker to conceal themselves in, and sure enough, as you pass a building's shadowy doorway, a figure suddenly leaps out at you. Thankfully, as you were taking care to be alert, you quickly step backwards and manage to avoid a punch aimed at your stomach. #ELSE With [com.name] by your side, you find yourself [pc.walking] down the deserted streets of Dominion, the eerie silence broken only by the occasional crash of arcane thunder high above you. There are many hiding places for a would-be attacker to conceal themselves in, and sure enough, as you pass a building's shadowy doorway, a figure suddenly leaps out at you. Thankfully, as you were taking care to be alert, you quickly step backwards and manage to avoid a punch aimed at your stomach. #ENDIF

[com.speech(Hey!)] [com.name] calls out, stepping forwards to stand by your side and confront this unknown assailant.

As the two of you get a better look at the mysterious figure, you see that [npc.sheIs] [npc.a_fullRace(true)]. Looking up at [npc.her] [npc.face+], you see a desperately hungry look in [npc.her] [npc.eyes], and you know that the arcane thunder has driven [npc.herHim] into a state of uncontrollable lust. [npc.She] looks determined to claim both you and [com.name] as [npc.her] prizes, and is ready to fight the two of you in order to claim your bodies.

[npc.speech(Come on now, there's no need for any violence!)] [npc.she] teases, [npc.her] voice dripping with lustful desperation as [npc.she] takes a step forwards. [npc.speech(Just surrender! Come on! I need a good fuck right now!)]

The arcane storm, combined with your powerful aura, has filled [npc.herHim] with a wild lust, and, #IF(game.isNonConEnabled()) knowing that defeat will result in the two of you being raped by this horny [npc.race], both you and [com.name] ready yourselves for a fight. #ELSE knowing that defeat will result in this horny [npc.race] wanting to have sex with the two of you, both you and [com.name] ready yourselves for a fight. #ENDIF

#ELSE

#IF(pc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType()==PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_BACK_ALLEYS_SAFE) You find yourself [pc.walking] down the wide alleyway, the eerie silence broken only by the occasional crash of arcane thunder high above you. There are many hiding places for a would-be attacker to conceal themselves in, and sure enough, as you pass a building's shadowy doorway, a figure suddenly leaps out at you. Thankfully, as you were taking care to be alert, you quickly step backwards and manage to avoid a punch aimed at your stomach. #ELSE You find yourself [pc.walking] down the deserted streets of Dominion, the eerie silence broken only by the occasional crash of arcane thunder high above you. There are many hiding places for a would-be attacker to conceal themselves in, and sure enough, as you pass a building's shadowy doorway, a figure suddenly leaps out at you. Thankfully, as you were taking care to be alert, you quickly step backwards and manage to avoid a punch aimed at your stomach. #ENDIF

Turning to face the assailant, you see [npc.a_fullRace(true)] grinning devilishly at you. There's no mistaking that hungry look in [npc.her] [npc.eyes], and you know that the arcane thunder has driven [npc.herHim] into a state of uncontrollable lust. [npc.She] looks determined to claim you as [npc.her] prize, and is ready to fight you in order to claim your body.

[npc.speech(Aww, there's no need for that!)] [npc.she] teases, the desperation clearly audible in [npc.her] voice as [npc.she] sees that you're ready to fight [npc.herHim]. [npc.speech(Just give up! Come on! I need a good fuck right now!)]

The arcane storm, combined with your powerful aura, has filled [npc.herHim] with a wild lust, and you have a good idea of what [npc.she] wants to do with you. #IF(game.isNonConEnabled()) Knowing that defeat will result in being raped by this horny [npc.race], you ready yourself for a fight. #ELSE Knowing that defeat will result in this horny [npc.race] wanting to have sex with you, you ready yourself for a fight. #ENDIF

#ENDIF

Wanting to avoid a fight, you decide to give [npc.name] what [npc.she] wants. Flashing a seductive smile [npc.her] way, you [pc.moan], [pc.speech(Come on then, I'm all yours!)]

A delighted, lust-filled smile breaks out across [npc.namePos] face, and [npc.she] instantly rushes forwards, reaching up to grab you by the [pc.arms] before pulling you forwards into a tight embrace. Pressing [npc.her] [npc.lips] against yours, [npc.she] thrusts [npc.her] [npc.tongue] into your mouth, aggressively kissing you for a moment before pulling back, growling, [npc.speech(Oh yes... Fuck, I'm just so horny!)]

Feeling very much the same way, you surrender yourself to [npc.namePos] dominant touch, allowing [npc.herHim] to use you for some sexual relief...

Wanting to avoid a fight, you decide to give [npc.name] what [npc.she] wants, and offer, [pc.speech(If you're looking for a bit of fun, [com.name] and I are more than happy to play along...)]

#IF(com.isAttractedTo(npc) || !game.isNonConEnabled()) [com.speech(That's right,)] [com.name] teases, [com.speech(We can satisfy your desires...)] #ELSE [com.speech([pc.Name]!)] [com.name] interjects, [com.speech(I-I really don't want to do this!)] #ENDIF

[npc.speech(Yes! Let's get started and fuck already!)] [npc.name] desperately whines, before stepping forwards and placing [npc.a_hand] on each of your waists. With a hungry growl, [npc.she] dominantly pulls the two of you up against [npc.herHim], before leaning in to plant a passionate kiss on your [pc.lips+].

As you press yourself up against [npc.name], [npc.she] suddenly breaks off the kiss, before turning to [com.name] and thrusting [npc.her] [npc.tongue+] down [com.her] throat. #IF(com.isAttractedTo(npc) || !game.isNonConEnabled()) Your [com.companion] lets out a delighted, muffled [com.moan] as [com.she] eagerly returns the kiss, [com.speech(~Mmm!~ Yes!)] #ELSE Your [com.companion] lets out a flustered, muffled yelp, before pushing [npc.name] away from [com.herHim] and shouting, [com.speech(Get away from me!)] #ENDIF

Before either of you can make another move, [npc.name] suddenly reaches up to grab you both by the shoulders, and with a determined push, forces the two of you down onto all fours. Dropping down behind you, [npc.she] growls, [npc.speech(You dirty sluts! I'll put the two of you in your place!)]

Wanting to avoid a fight, you decide to do the only other thing you can think of, and turn towards [com.name] to ask, [pc.speech(You'll take one for the team, won't you, [com.name]? I don't really want to get into a fight; all you need to do is let [npc.herHim] fuck you...)]

#IF(com.isAttractedTo(npc) || !game.isNonConEnabled()) [com.speech(Sure thing, [pc.name],)] [com.name] replies, [com.speech(If that's really what you want me to do...)] #ELSE [com.speech([pc.Name]?! What the hell?!)] [com.name] replies in alarm, [com.speech(I really don't want to do that!)] #ENDIF

[npc.speech(Come on, let's fuck already! I need it!)] [npc.name] desperately whines as [npc.she] steps forwards and prepares to get what [npc.she] wants by use of force.

#IF(com.isAttractedTo(npc) || !game.isNonConEnabled()) [com.speech(There's no need for violence,)] [com.name] says, before turning to face [npc.name] and teasing, [com.speech(You can fuck me all you want!)] #ELSE [pc.speech(There's no need for violence!)] you exclaim, before spinning [com.name] around and pushing [com.herHim] towards [npc.name]. [pc.speech(You can fuck [com.name] all you want!)] #ENDIF

Before your [com.companion] can make a move, [npc.name] lets out a hungry [npc.moan] and quickly reaches up to grab [com.her] [com.arm+]. With a dominant pull, [npc.she] forces your [com.companion] into [npc.her] embrace, before planting a passionate kiss on [com.her] [com.lips+]. After a moment, [npc.she] breaks away, before growling, [npc.speech(You're going to be a good [com.girl] now, aren't you bitch? Your little friend over there can watch me fuck you senseless!)]

You let out a sigh of relief, happy that you had [com.name] to use as a bargaining chip. Leaning back against a nearby wall, you decide to keep a lookout for any other horny citizens while [npc.name] has [npc.her] fun with your [com.companion]...

[npc.Name] collapses to the floor, completely defeated. As [npc.she] gazes up at you, desperately whimpering and biting [npc.her] [npc.lip], you see that [npc.she] still has a hungry, lustful look in [npc.her] [npc.eyes]. In defeat, [npc.namePos] arcane aura is completely overwhelmed by the power of your own, and, unable to control [npc.her] burning desire, [npc.she] reaches down to [npc.her] crotch and starts stroking [npc.herself], making pitiful little whining noises as [npc.she] squirms on the floor.

[npc.speech(~Aah!~ What are you waiting for?! Please! Come fuck me!)] [npc.she] pleads, bucking [npc.her] [npc.hips+] against [npc.her] [npc.hand] as [npc.she] continues touching [npc.herself].

You wonder if you should indulge [npc.her] request. After all, [npc.she] was planning on doing the same to you, and [npc.she] quite clearly wants it. Then again, maybe it's best to just turn around and take your leave...

[npc.Name] collapses to the floor, completely defeated. [npc.She] glances up at you for a moment, before casting [npc.her] gaze to the floor, and in that brief moment, you see that there's a desperate look of regret in [npc.her] [npc.eyes]. Making pitiful little whining noises, [npc.she] tries to shuffle away from you, clearly worried about what your intentions are.

[npc.speech(J-Just take my money and leave me alone!)] [npc.she] pleads, throwing [npc.her] #IF(npc.isFeminine()) purse #ELSE wallet #ENDIF at your feet.

#IF(game.isNonConEnabled())

You wonder if you should do as [npc.she] says, and leave [npc.herHim] alone. Then again, you could take advantage of [npc.her] weakened, vulnerable body...

#ENDIF

Deciding to give [npc.name] what it is [npc.she] so desperately craves, you step up to [npc.herHim], before reaching down to take hold of [npc.her] [npc.arm] and pulling [npc.herHim] to [npc.her] [npc.feet]. The moment [npc.she] finds [npc.herself] standing, [npc.name] leans in against you, [npc.moaning], [npc.speech(~Mmm!~ Yes! Take me! Take me now!)]

Without any further warning, [npc.she] suddenly presses [npc.her] [npc.lips] against yours, and, eager to return [npc.her] display of affection, you pull [npc.herHim] into your embrace, passionately returning [npc.her] kiss.

After a moment, you push [npc.name] away a little, grinning as you see [npc.her] lust-filled gaze roam up and down your body. Preparing to make your next move, you take a firm grip on [npc.her] [npc.hips+], before [pc.moaning], [pc.speech(This is going to be good...)]

Take me! Take me now!)]

Roughly thrusting your [pc.tongue+] into [npc.her] mouth, you use your free [pc.hand] to reach around and give [npc.her] [npc.ass+] a dominant squeeze.

Seeing the lustful look in your [pc.eyes], [npc.she] lets out a little [npc.sob], desperately trying to struggle out of your grip as you firmly hold [npc.herHim] in your embrace...

You really aren't sure what to do next, and start to feel pretty uncomfortable with the fact that you just beat up this poor [npc.race]. Leaning down, you do the first thing that comes into your mind, and start apologising, [pc.speech(Sorry... I was just trying to defend myself, you know... Erm... Is there anything I can do to make it up to you?)]

For a moment, a look of confusion crosses over [npc.namePos] face, but, as [npc.she] sees that you're genuinely troubled by what you've just done, an evil grin crosses [npc.her] face. [npc.She] stands up, and, grabbing you by the [pc.arm], roughly pulls you into [npc.her] as [npc.she] growls, [npc.speech(How about you start by apologising properly?!)]

[npc.NamePos] strong, dominant grip on your [pc.arm] causes you to let out a lewd little moan, and your submissive nature takes over as you do as [npc.she] asks. [pc.speech(I'm really sorry! Please forgive me! I'll do anything! Anything you ask! Just please, don't be mad!)]

[npc.Name] roughly yanks you forwards, and with a menacing growl, [npc.she] forces [npc.her] tongue into your mouth. You let out a muffled yelp as your opponent takes charge, but as you feel [npc.her] [npc.hands] reaching down to start roughly groping your ass, you realise that you couldn't be happier with how things have turned out...

With [npc.name] collapsed to the floor in defeat, you can't help but let out a triumphant laugh as you turn towards [com.name], [pc.speech(I think we should have some fun before we carry on! You take [npc.her] face, I'll get [npc.her] rear!)]

With that, you and [com.name] move into position around [npc.name]. As [npc.she] pushes [npc.herself] up onto all fours, you drop down onto your knees behind [npc.herHim], before shuffling forwards and bumping your groin against [npc.her] [npc.ass+].

[com.speech(You'd better be good at using your mouth,)] [com.name] says, dropping down to [com.her] knees in front of the defeated [npc.race].

Completely exhausted from losing the fight against the two of you, [npc.name] is powerless to do anything other than prepare to get fucked...

With [npc.name] collapsed to the floor in defeat, you can't help but let out a triumphant laugh as you turn towards [com.name], [pc.speech(I think you should have some fun with this one!)]

Preparing to make [com.her] next move, [com.name] takes a firm grip on [npc.her] [npc.hips+], before [com.moaning], [com.speech(This is going to be good...)]

W-What the hell?!)] [com.name] replies in alarm. [com.speech(I-I really don't want to do that!)] #ENDIF

#IF(com.isAttractedTo(npc) || !game.isNonConEnabled()) [com.speech(We were just deciding who's going to be the lucky one you get to fuck!)] [com.name] replies, turning around and stepping up to [npc.name]. [com.speech(And it turns out it's me!)] #ELSE [pc.speech(We were just deciding who's going to be the lucky one you get to fuck!)] you reply, spinning [com.name] around and pushing [com.herHim] towards [npc.name]. [pc.speech(And it turns out it's [com.name]!)] #ENDIF

Before either of you can make another move, [npc.name] lets out a hungry [npc.moan], before reaching up to grab [com.namePos] [com.arm]. With a dominant pull, [npc.she] forces [com.name] into [npc.her] embrace, before planting a passionate kiss on [com.her] [com.lips]. After a moment, [npc.she] breaks away, before growling, [npc.speech(You're going to be a good [com.girl] now, aren't you bitch? Your little friend over there can watch me fuck you senseless!)]

You let out a sigh of relief, happy that [com.name] is going to give [npc.name] some relief. Leaning back against a nearby wall, you decide to keep watch for any other aggressors while [npc.name] has [npc.her] fun with your companion...

#IF(pc.hasCompanions()) Neither you nor [com.name] can carry on fighting any more, and you both collapse to the ground, defeated. A mocking laugh causes the two of you to look up, and you see [npc.name] grinning down at you. #ELSE You simply don't have the energy to continue fighting any more, and with a defeated sigh, you collapse to the ground. A mocking laugh causes you to wearily look up, and you see [npc.name] triumphantly grinning down at you. #ENDIF

[npc.speech(I hope the two of you are looking forward to this as much as I am!)] [npc.name] exclaims, the tone of [npc.her] voice dripping with lust, [npc.speech(And if not, then too bad! I'm going to have my fun fucking both of you at once, and that's all that matters!)]

With that, [npc.name] steps forwards and prepares to move you and [com.name] into position...

Leaning forwards, [npc.she] then lustfully plants a wet kiss on each of your lips, before pulling back and happily exclaiming, [npc.speech(Now let's get this started!)]
